comment: As a developer, I see huge potential in the future: with enough abstraction, OXOLO could be used to generate video tutorials to replace the STORYBOOKS of any company creating content blocks on video.

As a product seller, I would use OXOLO every day: short videos on instragram, reels, any social network. You can reduce advertising costs by generating daily visibility of the product in the market. Small handmade crafters usually don't advertise their product at all, with OXOLO they can do.

As a Marathon participant, I can confirm that OXOLO exceeded all my expectations in generating videos just from the start page of the event (https://www.marathon-hannover.de/strecken/streckenverlauf.html): all important aspects are taken into account, sponsors, distances. This video really SELLS. As a member of the Achilles group (running with blind people) I see great potential in OXOLO to attract sponsors and participants for races around the world.

As a job seeker, I used OXOLO to generate a video on my LinkedIn profile. I would not recommend this product for this purpose: the generated video told more about my current job than about me as a job seeker.

I'd like consistency. Even though the site is not a product, a few things catch my eye. For example, I didn't align the buttons in the header. Isn't that noticeable? Some text is not capitalised, many buttons are not centred (used padding instead of align - eg. User profile).
I would expect Filters to be applied without click on 'SET FILTER': currently it is weird: checkboxes are selected but not applied.

focus: CRITICAL BUG, PLEASE FIX EVEN IF YOU DON'T HIRE ME!!!
comment: If the video creation fails, the user sees information that credits will be returned to them, but this doesn't happen until a hot refresh of the page. How to reproduce: create a broken video. Credits are deducted and not refunded. Refresh the page.
I want to be able to see untruncated link that was used for video creation and have possibility to copy it.
User profile. Avatars, some information, preferences - could be used for default suggestions for languages, actors.
Even if the user did not select 'amazon' or 'linkedin' when creating the video, but the link contains it, add the appropriate icon by default.

Different parts of the site have different user interfaces and it's a bit distracting (in the studio, https://studio.oxolo.com/studio-home the drop-down menu looks different than the video creation https://www.oxolo.com/solutions/video-creator/). From the user's point of view it's one product and the interface should be similar.
Endpoints in the tutorial are not copied by a click. Dev-user has to copy them directly. Small change, big satisfaction.
I would love to have a checkbox to be able to get e-mail when my video is ready OR failed. I made more than 10 videos, got notification only twice.

positive: Really good highlights for the product
Even when there are multiple items in a purchase, attention is paid to each one.
negative: At the end of the video, a small pause is needed after the actor stops talking.
Focus on the company, not the person
No 'selling' for a Person - no skills, no focuses, only mentioning as a contact person.
